note: Hello, I'm Simon! Greetings from Switzerland where I spend my days immersed in the captivating world of IT. When I'm not coding or doing managing stuff at Zurich Airport, you'll often find me diving into the fascinating realm of amateur radio under the callsign HB3XDB. But my proudest role? That of a dad to two incredible boys. Join me on this journey as I navigate the frequencies of life, technology, and fatherhood!
